content: `| | |outBoundArrivalAirport| |`FlightManifest`|`<OutBoundDetails>`| | |fareBasis| |`FlightManifest`|`<FareBasis>`| | |specialServices| | | | | | extraInfo| | | | | | ssrCode| |`FlightManifest`|`<SSRCode>`| | | ssrCode| |`FlightManifest`|`<SubSSRCodes>`| | # Flight PAX Summary Data Model ### Data Retrieval #### - Data Retrieval Scope * Pax summary & Pax ssr summary: Flight leg list conditions(From 180 minutes before the departure time, to 40 minutes after the departure time); * (`schedops.LEG.DEP_DT` - 180 minutes <= Current Date(UTC) <= `schedops.LEG.DEP_DT` + 40 minutes) and * `schedops.LEG.WHAT_IF` = “_” and * `schedops.LEG.LEG_TYPE` = (“C“ or “J“ or “O“) and * `schedops.LEG.LEG_STATE` <> (“CNL“ or “DEL“ or “INC“) * Checked in passengers for offline stations: Mail Date > Last Data Retrieval Date #### - Source Service * Pax summary: `CustomerManifest` * WSDL: `https://iflyresapi.ibsgen.com/iRes_CheckIn_WS/services/ReportsPort` * Method: `getCustomerManifestInfo` * Pax ssr summary: `FlightManifest` * WSDL: `https://iflyresapi.ibsgen.com/iRes_Booking_WS/services/FlightPort` * Method: `retrieveFlightManifest` * Checked in passengers for offline stations: * `microsoftonline` * URL: `https://login.microsoftonline.com/${tenant_id}/oauth2/v2.0/token` * `microsoft_messages` * URL: `https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/users/${user_name}/messages?$filter=lastModifiedDateTime ge ${processTime}&$top=1000&$orderby=lastModifiedDateTime desc` * `microsoft_messages_attachments` * URL: `https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/users/${user_name}/messages/${mail_id}/attachments/` #### - Source Query * Pax summary & Pax ssr summary: `Riverx_FlightLegForPaxSchedule_Query` #### - Data Retrieval Trigger & Steps * Trigger: Every 5 minutes * Steps: * Pax summary & Pax ssr summary; * Execute `Riverx_FlightLegForPaxSchedule_Query` query * Call `CustomerManifest` service using the fields coming from `Riverx_FlightLegForPaxSchedule_Query` query result * Call `FlightManifest` service usin
